court: IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
judgment_text:
[[1]]

IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

ORDINARY ORDINARY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION. ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION. ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION.

COMPANY PETITION No.215 of 1987.

In the matter of the Companies Act, 1956:

And

In the Matter of M/s. Elequent

Engineering Designs Private Limited

(In Liqn.)

O.L. Report dated 21st July,2006.

Ms.Seema Sarnaik with Ameja Tamhane,

Advocate for Workers.

Mr. Dilip Pange, Company Secretary

for E.D.Steels Pvt.Ltd.

Smt. K.V. Gautam,Ag.O.L.,present.

DATED: DATED: DATED: 27TH JULY, 2006. 27TH JULY, 2006. 27TH JULY, 2006.

P.C.:- P.C.:- P.C.:-

]

The Official Liquidator has submitted a

Report

and sought directions in pursuance

of

the

show

cause notice to M/s.

E.D.

Steels

Pvt.Ltd.

for

non

compliance of

the

order

dated

th March, and for disclosing

the

state

of affairs pertaining to the Companies.

Three names are set out in prayer clause (b)

[[2]]

of the report.

]

Ms.Seema Sarnaik appearing for the

workmen

who

were employed by the Company

in

Liquidation

invites

my

attention

to

the

earlier

orders

and

submits

that

when

the

entities mentioned at para of the report had

claimed

right,

title

and

interest

to

the

machineries

then they were obliged to pay the

security charges and that is how the direction

is

issued

on th March, by this

Court.

She,

therefore,

submits

that

appropriate

action be taken for breach of orders passed by

this Court.

]

Mr. Dilip Pange, Company Secretary of

M/s.

E.D.

Steels

Pvt.

Ltd.,

makes

a

statement

that

a sum of Rs.

,668/-

being

the

share

of the said E.D.Steels Pvt.

Ltd.

towards

the security charges as determined by

the

Official

Liquidator, would be

deposited

with the Official Liquidator within a period

of four weeks from today.

]

He states that one of the partners of

[[3]]

M/s.Narendra

Engg.

Works is a

Direcotr

of

M/s.E.D.Stools (P) Ltd.as well.

Therefore, he

would try and persuade him to pay the share of

this firm during the aforesaid period.

]

Stand over to two weeks for issuance of

directions with regard to recovery of security

charges from other entities mentioned in para of the report dated 21st July, 2006.

]

Within this period, the O.L. to take

steps

to

seek

sanction

of

the

Court

for

releasing the amounts in favour of the workmen

as per the adjudication done by the Official

Liquidator.

[S.C. [S.C. [S.C. DHARMADHIKARI,J] DHARMADHIKARI,J] DHARMADHIKARI,J]
reasoning: All fallbacks failed or not confident.
